event_description: Join us for the Oman Cultural Festival, a celebration of Omani heritage and culture. Enjoy traditional music, dance, food, and crafts from across the region. This event is a perfect opportunity to immerse yourself in the rich cultural tapestry of Oman and experience the warmth and hospitality of its people.
dhofar description: Dhofar is a region in the Sultanate of Oman, which includes the governorates of Dhofar, Al Wusta, and Al Dhahirah. It is known for its unique climate, which is cooler and wetter than the rest of the country, and for its frankincense trees, which produce the world's finest frankincense. The region is also home to a number of archaeological sites, including the ancient city of Ubar, which is said to have been destroyed by a natural disaster.

faq1_question: How can I reset my password?
faq1_answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on the 'Forgot Password' link. You will receive an email with instructions on how to reset your password.
faq2_question: How can I update my profile information?
faq2_answer: To update your profile information, go to the 'Profile' section of the app and click on the 'Edit Profile' button. You can then update your information and save your changes.
